scripts.check-db: npx tsx -e "import mongoose from 'mongoose'; import dotenv from 'dotenv'; dotenv.config(); const uri = process.env.MONGODB_URI || 'mongodb://localhost:27017/test'; console.log('Database URI:', uri.split('@')[1]?.split('/')[1] || 'test'); mongoose.connect(uri).then(() => { console.log('Connected successfully'); return mongoose.connection.db.listCollections().toArray(); }).then(collections => { console.log('Collections:', collections.map(c => c.name)); mongoose.disconnect(); }).catch(console.error);"
